comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: I think this may be on the O'Connell Street side of the Herald Office (Hunter Street). The Fairfax newspapers were on display as this 8/11/1899 (at 11.50) photo shows. Best to use the amazing zoom at from.ph/28177 . I think the stonework matches. [http://www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/3003586345/]
